name: MAIN
code:
DATA: BEGIN OF ls_item,
        matnr TYPE matnr,
        werks TYPE werks_d,
      END OF ls_item.
DATA lt_item TYPE TABLE OF ls_item.
DATA ls_wa TYPE ls_item.

SELECT * FROM mara INTO TABLE lt_item.

* Some logic
LOOP AT lt_item INTO ls_wa.
  IF ls_wa-matnr = '12345'.
    WRITE: / ls_wa-werks.
  ENDIF.
ENDLOOP.

READ TABLE lt_item WITH KEY matnr+0(3) = '12345'.
WRITE: / 'Done'.
